items.title: Tech giants to turn into ‘Lagnificent 7’ as U.S. exceptionalism peaks, say Bank of America strategists
items.description: The ”Magnificent Seven” grouping of tech stocks that have powered markets is set to start lagging the market, a team of strategists says.

items.title: Chevron logs its first refining loss in four years, sending stock lower
items.description: Chevron touted “record production” as well as stock buybacks and announced an increase in its quarterly dividend.

items.title: ‘I have a secret that’s slowly taking all the joy from my life’: I’m happily married for 25 years, but I made a big financial mistake. How do I fix this?
items.description: “Over the past couple years, I have fought to get therapy and medications to bring me back to myself.”

items.title: Bond yields rise as traders eye tariff developments
items.description: Bond yields rose on Friday with investors paying attention to tariff news as key inflation data was set for release.

items.title: Why there’s now ‘incredible demand for physical gold’ in New York markets
items.description: A rush on physical gold, thanks to President Donald Trump’s tariff threats, has fueled a rise in prices of the precious metal to fresh record highs.
